plugged.config.general.use_embedded_serv: If §aYes§r, Plugged will connect to its own embedded server.
Set to §cNo§r if you want to connect to an external
Buttplug server instead (such as Intiface Desktop).
In that case, you can configure the server URL
plugged.config.general.auto_scan_devices: If §aYes§r, the mod will scan for devices
after connecting to the Buttplug server.
plugged.config.general.auto_control_devi: If §aYes§r, the mod will automatically control
any device scanned by the server.
plugged.config.connection.websocket_serv: The URL of the Buttplug websocket server.
This setting is only used when the
"Use Embedded Server" property is set to §cNo§r.
plugged.config.connection.auto_connect_a: If §aYes§r, the mod will automatically connect to
the Websocket Buttplug server upon joining a world.
plugged.config.transitions.enabled.0: If §aYes§r, the vibration intensity will have a smooth transition.
plugged.config.transitions.increasing_st: The maximum upward vibration intensity change that can occur in one tick.
For example, a value of 0.1 means the vibration intensity can only
increase by 0.1 every tick until it reaches its target value.
Lower values means the transition is slower and smoother.
plugged.config.transitions.decreasing_st: The maximum downward vibration intensity change that can occur in one tick.
For example, a value of 0.1 means the vibration intensity can only
decrease by 0.1 every tick until it reaches its target value.
Lower values means the transition is slower and smoother.
plugged.config.triggers.enabled.0: If §aYes§r, the enabled devices will react to this event.
plugged.config.triggers.duration.0: The duration of the vibration in ticks (20 ticks = 1 second).
plugged.config.triggers.hurt.0: Triggers when the player takes damage.
plugged.config.triggers.attack.0: Triggers when the player deals damage.
plugged.config.triggers.break_block.0: Triggers when the player breaks a block.
plugged.config.triggers.breaking_block.0: Triggers when the player is breaking a block.
plugged.config.triggers.place_block.0: Triggers when the player places a block.
plugged.config.triggers.pickup_item.0: Triggers when the player picks up an item from the ground.
plugged.config.triggers.pickup_xp.0: Triggers when the player gains XP.
plugged.config.triggers.craft.0: Triggers when the player crafts an item.
plugged.config.triggers.smelt.0: Triggers when the player smelts an item.
plugged.config.triggers.enchant.0: Triggers when the player enchants an item.
plugged.config.triggers.repair.0: Triggers when the player repairs an item using an Anvil.
